content: the forest of first socks began with a problem i had some hand-dyed yarn that was striping and wanted to disrupt this so it wasn t so obvious after considerable research and mulling i came up with this easy slip_stitch pattern that blends the row a little and adds an interesting texture reminiscent of fir trees in a forest instructions are given for one size to make smaller or larger sizes socks i advise using smaller or larger needles you can also increase the stitch count in increments of 4 sts ie 56 or 64 sts advice is given on how to adjust the ribbing accordingly happy knitting
